articles.title: HP unveiled the lightest 14-inch gaming laptop in the world at CES 2024 - Engadget
articles.description: Weighing just 3.5 pounds, HP claims the new Omen Transcend 14 is the lightest 14-inch gaming laptop in the world.
articles.content: Sometimes the never-ending quest to shave an extra gram or millimeter off a new laptop can become a bore. However, when a company can do it without cutting too many corners, that deserves some attent… [+4085 chars]
